p: In this study, we examined the colors and yields (% v/ w) of essential oils from the fruits of four species of Schisandra. All the samples studied were fragrant and had different colors: milk white for SP, yellow for SS, saffron yellow for SG, and wheat for SR. The yield of fruit essential oil ranged from 5.88% to 7.51% ( v/ w). The highest yield of essential oils was SG (7.51%), followed by SR (6.91%), SS (6.11%), and SP (5.88%). The yields of essential oils from the fruits of four species far exceeded the yield of the essential oils from the fruits of SS obtained from hydrodistillation [ 18].
